DOC.brief_title: A Trial on Treatments of Hirschsprung Allied Disease
DOC.detailed_description: The present study was designed to compare the efficacy of conservative treatment,such as anal dilatation, colonic lavage and so on, to operative treatment for improvement of constipation symptoms in children with Hirschsprung allied disease
